definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

pinyin: Fa3 lan2 xi1 Ti3 yu4 chang3

definition: Francis Bacon (1561-1626), English Renaissance philosopher and early scientist
pinyin: Fa3 lan2 xi1 si1 · Pei2 gen1

definition: Archduke Francis Ferdinand of Austria (1863-1914), heir to the Hapsburg throne, whose assassination in Sarajevo led to World War I
pinyin: Fa3 lan2 xi1 si1 · Fei3 di2 nan2

sentences.english: 1328 - Philip VI is crowned King of France.
sentences.chinese: 1328年的今天，腓力六世加冕成爲法蘭西國王。

sentences.english: In 1717 he captured a large French merchantman ship. He made this a powerful ship by putting forty guns on her and named her the "Queen Anne's Revenge".
sentences.chinese: 1717年，他捕獲了一艘大型的法蘭西商船。

sentences.english: 1852 - Napoleon III becomes Emperor of France.
sentences.chinese: 1852年，拿破崙三世成爲法蘭西的皇帝。

sentences.english: Evidently, Frances and I were to eat in here, by ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 終於，我和法蘭西斯要在這裏一起喫飯了。

sentences.english: Frances is the spitting image of her beautiful mother.
sentences.chinese: 法蘭西斯真是她漂亮媽咪的翻版哪。

sentences.english: When French femmes fatales appear on the silver screen, we seem to be almost embraced by a pleasant fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕法蘭西美女僅出現在熒幕上，就帶來襲人暗香。

sentences.english: The year is AD 1096. The place, the kingdom of France.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是法蘭西王國，現在是公元1096年。

sentences.english: She says, I am the great great grand cousin of the queen of France.
sentences.chinese: 她說，我是法蘭西皇后的遠遠遠房表親。

sentences.english: In 1984 he became the first black inducted into the Académie Française.
sentences.chinese: 1984年成爲加入法蘭西學院的第一位黑人。

sentences.english: "Where are you going?" I asked Frances.
The French Revolution is the consecration of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 法蘭西革命是人類無上的光榮。

sentences.english: 1328 - King Philip VI of France is crowned.
sentences.chinese: 1328年的今天，法蘭西國王菲利浦六世加冕。

sentences.english: Francis translated that French novel by himself.
sentences.chinese: 法蘭西斯獨力翻譯那本文法文小說。

sentences.english: They've arrived to be blessed, in celebration of the Feast Day of St.
sentences.chinese: 它們前來接受祝福，慶祝亞西濟聖法蘭西斯宴會節。

sentences.english: One of my roommates, Francis, is an aspiring actor.
sentences.chinese: 我的室友當中，法蘭西斯是非常有上進心的演員。

sentences.english: 1654 - Louis XIV is crowned King of France.
sentences.chinese: 1654年的今天，路易十四世加冕爲法蘭西國王。

definition: Bohemia, historical country of central Europe
